artist: Artist: Walter Gramatté; Author: Boris Ssadowskij; Translator: Alexander Eliasberg; Publisher: Axel Junker Verlag, Berlin
description: blue book with red lettering on cover with four illustrations by Gramatté; first image is of a woman in bed with pillow behind her head and her eyes closed; her arms are wrapped around the head and shoulders of a stricken looking man laying in bed with her; second image is a man dressed in black in the lower portion of the print surrounded by foliage; in the upper right corner is a building and a sun emanating rays; third image is man sitting up in bed in a white garment with a collar and buttons looking fearfully at a figure facing him on the right side of the image; fourth image is a man sitting in center of image holding something that he has in his mouth; a window behind his left shoulder is emanating rays of light; translated into German by Alexander Eliasberg
title: The Apple King
